{"id":989301113,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1688821974,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/989301113/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Pivot Integer","memory":"42.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int pivotInteger(int n) {\n        // calculate prefix and suffix sums\n        int[] nums = new int[n];\n\n        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            nums[i] = i + 1;\n        }\n        \n        int pre[] = new int[n];\n        int suf[] = new int[n];\n\n        int sum_pre = 0;\n        int sum_suf = 0;\n        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            sum_pre += nums[i];\n            pre[i] = sum_pre;\n            \n            // suffix sum\n            sum_suf += nums[n - i - 1];\n            suf[n - i - 1] = sum_suf;\n        }\n\n        // searching for pivot index\n        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            if(pre[i] - suf[i] == 0) return nums[i];\n        }\n\n        return -1;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-pivot-integer","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
